creator: cipriani.m@mellon.com
text:
we use both log4j and several apache packages for a web service interface.  we
see that log4j works great,until the first web service call is used.  at that
point, all writing to the logs stops.

we had to revert back to System.err and System.out logging.

any assistance would be greatly appreciated.

The bug seems more related to web-services than to log4j. Please contact the 
appropriate project.
creator: ceki@apache.org
cipriani.m@mellon.com
text:
I never thought of researching that end as well.  the thought was that since 
that still worked, that it was log4j that was breaking.  now that i think 
about it, the "break" has to occuring by something that the WS calls are doing.

i will cross post there as well.

thanks
